June 7, 1954
IMPORTANT NOTICE
mm NETWORK
IMPORTANT NOTICE
Charts for In-School Fcotgrans
As in "ha past* the charge for in-school program service from the
Network will fee one-quarter of the basic Network Assessment Fee*
Howg-vm^- ••—Once again, when it will save a station money* Network Hdq<,
will charge only its standard price for dubbing single reels (which has
been $2*00 per reel since Jan* 1, 1954)» and id.ll pot charge the extra
on-equarter of the Network Assessment Fee for in-school program service*
In other words9 if a station’s Network Assessment Fee is 1400*00 and
its in-school program service fee is $100,.00* but the station orders
only one (1) in-school series of 88 programs (14 reels), that station Will
be charged for the in-school series by the reel* It will pay only *28*00
not $100*C0o
